name: CubeArcade
description:
This is a 1 vs 1 game where your objective is to move your cube to the box before your opponent!

CONTROL
Player1:-wasd move-space bar attack-f super attack-
Player2:-arrow move-enter attack-backspace super attack
POWER UP
White=bullet bigger 
Purple=your speed is higher
Orange=for 3 second the cube to move is moving faster
Red=Destroy walls

Rules
1)you need someone to play with you!
2)use the controls to move and attack with the character you have chosen
3)move your character on the cube with your same color (black move the black cube and white move the white cube)
4)move the cube inside the box (with the same color of the cube)

Credits

Development:Gianuario Graphic:Gianuario Audio:Gianuario 

Game problem and bugs made by : Gianuario
